Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Berkeley \Berkeley\ n. Bishop George Berkeley; b. 1685, d. 1753. [WordNet 1.5]

Berkeley n 1: Irish philosopher and Anglican bishop who opposed the materialism of Thomas Hobbes (1685-1753) [syn: {Bishop Berkeley}, {George Berkeley}] 2: a city in California on the eastern shore of San Francisco Bay; site of the University of California at Berkeley
